description: Create column Language/area group at index 12 based on column Language using expression grel:cell.cross('AARGH languages updated','Language code')[0].cells['Language group'].value

Text transform on cells in column Language/area group using expression grel:if(and(inArray(['Judaica','Middle East','Slavic','Greek'],value),not(or(isBlank(cells['Holding Libraries'].value),cells['Holding Libraries'].value.contains('Widener'),cells['Holding Libraries'].value.contains('Microforms')))),'non-WID/MIC/MMF Unassigned',value)

Text transform on cells in column Language/area group using expression grel:if(and(inArray(['AARGH','Unassigned','Department?',''],value),or(isBlank(cells['Holding Libraries'].value),cells['Holding Libraries'].value.contains('Widener'),cells['Holding Libraries'].value.contains('Microforms')),cells.Country.value=='is'),'Judaica',value)
